page.title: 10SCHOOL PLAYGROUND GAMES.2.
page.content: Sharlene Wakefield. Tig the Scarecrow is a game like tig.What youi have to do is to always keep away from the person who is on and you do get tug you have to stand with your legs and arms apart and the people who haven't got tug come up and touch you on both arms and both legs without getting caught and then you are free. Chinese whispers is a good game.All you have to do is to sit in a circle on the floor and the person at the beginning sends a whisper off and you have to pass it on to the last person. They say what they have heard and sometimes it is very funny and nothing like what it started out like.
